p.span: Dear Parents & Guardians

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span:
As we prepare to embark on this grand adventure of digital and non-digital learning we at Valley Academy ask for your patience and communication. We probably will not see every need and are asking that you communicate with me directly so we can make sure all of our children are taken care of during this time of need.
Lunch

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: Our lunch program will proceed as normal with a drive up service at our school. This will start Monday March 23rd from 11:00-1:00 Breakfast for Tuesday can be picked up at that time.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: Lunches/breakfasts will be delivered to bus stops starting on Tuesday March 24th based on needs. Please fill out the attached form so we know your needs.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: We ask that you DO NOT leave your vehicle during pick up times. We will have someone guiding traffic, handing out materials (lunches, Chromebooks, packets, etc...) to your car window, answering questions, and directing you back out.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: Please follow the orange cones and employee directions as you enter the property through the main parking lot entrance. You will be directed around to the back of the school where we will have more room to guide your vehicle around to the correct spots for pickup.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

strong.class: x-el x-el-span c1-2g c1-2h c1-4i c1-2y c1-3j c1-2z c1-b x-d-ux

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: Starting Tuesday March 24th we are asking for an adult to drive through our pickup area at Valley to receive your child's Chromebook and other material. No walk-ups and no students please.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: In order to accommodate all traffic we will be sending a schedule for pickup times based on your child's grade level.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: If you have more than one child attending Valley, we will let you choose what grade level one of your children belongs to and pick up all material then.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: We ask that you DO NOT leave your vehicle during pick up times. We will have someone guiding traffic, handing out materials to your car window, answering questions, and directing you back out.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: Please follow the orange cones and employee directions as you enter the property through the main parking lot entrance. You will be directed around to the back of the school where we will have more room to guide your vehicle around to the correct spots for pickup.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

strong.class: x-el x-el-span c1-2g c1-2h c1-4i c1-2y c1-3j c1-2z c1-b x-d-ux

li.strong: Schedules will be emailed to you

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

strong.class: x-el x-el-span c1-2g c1-2h c1-4i c1-2y c1-3j c1-2z c1-b x-d-ux

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: Our office will be open for phone calls only. The hours are 8:00-3:30 Monday-Thursday and 8:00-1:00 on Friday PLEASE call for questions and do not come in.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: Individual tutoring and in-person accommodations will be on a person-to-person need. They will be set up by the individual teacher and or the SPED Director; when arriving for these needs please use the outside doors and instructions from these people.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: ALL paperwork, registrations, etc... should be left in our Dropbox(big black mailbox) by the front door.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

strong.class: x-el x-el-span c1-2g c1-2h c1-4i c1-2y c1-3j c1-2z c1-b x-d-ux

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: Judy Johnston, our Special Education Director will be contacting all students via email with more specific plans for accommodations.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

strong.class: x-el x-el-span c1-2g c1-2h c1-4i c1-2y c1-3j c1-2z c1-b x-d-ux

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: Our school counselor Laurie Harper will be reaching out to all parents in an email with the invitation for all students to connect with her if they are needing to.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: Laurie will also be contacting the students that she has worked with in the past to see if there is still other needs she can help with.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

strong.class: x-el x-el-span c1-2g c1-2h c1-4i c1-2y c1-3j c1-2z c1-b x-d-ux

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: To be in compliance with the "no mass gathering" we are trying to stagger the instruction times of all teachers in the school; we will be sending out a schedule for the time that teachers will be logged in and instructing online. This schedule will be sent on Monday March 23rd and classes will begin online starting Wednesday March 25th.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: We will have a paraprofessional included online with most classes in case there are questions or accommodations needed.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: Google Meet will be the platform teachers will be using. Your child will need to log into his/her Chromebook with their school email in order to use our secure server. They will receive an invite from their teacher in an email.

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: We will be running a short trial sync Tuesday afternoon for all students to make sure we can all access the Google Meet together and work out any and all bugs before Wednesday. More details on this will be emailed to you on Monday March 23rd or included with your pickup on Tuesday March 24th.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

strong.class: x-el x-el-span c1-2g c1-2h c1-4i c1-2y c1-3j c1-2z c1-b x-d-ux

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: TDS Communication is offering free 60 day internet for low-income families. Low income verification will be required from TDS. Call 844-684-1387 for more details

li.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

ul.li: Infowest is offering reduced monthly fees for new customers. Valley Academy Charter School will also help low-income families if they incur any charge with Infowest from now until July 1, 2020. You may pay nothing if you currently do not have internet access and qualify for free school lunch. Contact Tracy Stevens at 435-680-8526 for more info and qualifications.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

strong.class: x-el x-el-span c1-2g c1-2h c1-4i c1-2y c1-3j c1-2z c1-b x-d-ux

span.strong: Please email me if you have any questions.Tracy Stevens

p.span: Dear parents & guardians

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span: As you may know by now our State Superintendent and/or Governor has announced we will be having all schools enact a "Dismissal". This means that schools will not be accepting students in person. Instead teachers will be at the school teaching electronically through a digital platform and students will be at home learning either through their electronic devices or by using packets.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span: The dismissal will be for 2 weeks statewide, which means this will only affect us for 1 week (because or Spring Break) starting March 23rd and possibly ending March 27th; we will let you know asap if that time frame is extended.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span: You may have lots of questions, but please give us some time to prepare and we will continue to stay in touch through emails and our website. I will set up the website www.valleyacademycharter.com to have a student section with all the information under that tab.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span: Foreseeing this scenario as a possibility the Valley Admin team has been coordinating and implementing a plan for the last few weeks. The following is only an outline so that you have an understanding of how we will be working with you and the teachers to make this workable for everyone.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span: None of the following plan has been finalized so only view it as an example plan for now until we have finalized ALL plans and schedules and we will email and post the plan next week as it is finalized. This is to help answer questions for you that may come up over the next couple of days.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span: Possible solution plan:

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span: Parents will be picking up Chromebooks and/or packets on Monday March 23rd from the front of the school. We will have a curbside pickup scheduled with specific times for grade levels. We will have instructions given out on how to log in to the Chromebook and the platform used for video teaching. Your child's teacher will be teaching from their classroom. This will not be all day (we will share the schedule soon). Our IT staff are currently setting up Chromebooks to work from your home and connect to our server here at the school so that your children are protected and monitored as if they were on school grounds.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span: Federal IDEA is still enacted and usable at the school as we are still working with any child that has an IEP and in need of accommodations. Judy Johnston and the Admin team will be sending out instructions to any SPED child with an IEP soon. We may be able to still implement small group tutoring as needed.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span: For families that still need school breakfasts and lunches we have a plan in place to make sure you get that nutrition. This may be a curbside pickup and in some cases we will be delivering food to your current school bus stop. We are still working this issue out and will get that info out to you.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span: MIddle school students will probably keep the same ordered schedule, for example ELA first class, Science, PE, then the other classes the next day; the difference will be that the class times will be shortened. Students will be expected to do work on their own offline once the teacher signs off of the platform.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span: This is unprecedented on this scale, but I am confident that because we have planned for this ahead of time, we will be able to move throughout this time without many problems.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span: Please be patient and wait for us to email more information as it is finalized by us.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span: Please make this as positive as possible with your children. My heart goes out to our children as they must see this as a huge negative circumstance in our entire world. Please share with them the happiness in the world so they do not feel the gloom and doom that is being spread throughout the world right now.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span: This is a great step to slow this disease and give it time to run its course while we are protecting ourselves and staying out of social circles.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span: I feel very blessed and fortunate to be your child's principal. I look forward to seeing their smiling faces back at school as soon as we are given the okay.

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span: Thanks

span.class: x-el x-el-span c1-6u c1-6v c1-b c1-9t c1-9u c1-9v c1-9w c1-9x x-d-ux

p.span: Tracy Stevens

p.span: Social and Emotional Learning (SEL) is the process through which children and adults acquire and effectively apply the knowledge, attitudes and skills necessary to understand and manage emotions, set and achieve positive goals, feel and show empathy for others, establish and maintain positive relationships, and make responsible decisions.
WHY DO WE BELIEVE IN SEL? VIDEO #1
